title: Hard Looks
description:
Issue 1-10 of 'Andrew Vachss Hard Looks'

Dark Horse Comics, 1992-1993, 32-40 pages each

All stories written by or adapted from stories by Andrew Vachss

With further writing and illustration contributions from; Dave Gibbons, Tim Bradstreet, Gary Gianni, Barbara Randall Kesel, Chris Warner, Tony Fitzpatrick, Chet Williamson, Warren Pleece, David Lloyd, George Pratt, James O'Barr, Clem Robins, John Bergin, Geof Darrow, Bob Fingerman, Jerry Prosser, Monty Sheldon and MANY more.

Andrew Vachss' writing has been described as "red-hot and serious as a punctured lung", "hypnotically violent ... made up of equal part broken concrete block and razor wire", and "short and choppy, like the ticking of a time bomb". This ten-issue anthology series features a long list of comic book writers and artists both adapting and working directly with Vacchs to create images to go along with his words.

From the heyday of early 90s, adult themed alternative comics, I always thought this one should have been more popular, and more talked about. Definitely recommended.
